title: I think Yasuo would be fun to play...
body: If I wasn't so terrified of how I'll be inevitably screeched at.

replies.body: Don't give in to the dark side.
You scare me.
I scare a lot of people.
_Shivers_

OMG I know!
I was a Yasuo noob 
And all these toxic people used to use this Yasuo meme as an excuse to be toxic against me. 
Now here I am being called op
On the boards trying to defend my main. 


You keep playing Yasuo if you are up to Maining him and go through every obstacle and Barrier there is.  You can be Everything those Yas haters don't want you to be a. GodSuo.

You got this man.

> [{quoted}](name=Paperbase,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=9FzqIbLK,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-05-29T02:29:44.897+0000)

bruh look at my most recent thread.. i try
Man fuck those people. We mains stand together D:<

United we Stand m8

Fuck Toxic players They are the true cause of all the wrong decisions!
Lol
its a game play whats fun...stop with all the being afraid of flame BS
Pft, sometimes I think otherwise facing Maokai Caitlyn botlane.
Ikr. 5 games I do really good, 1 bad game after that = flamed.
every bad game i play i get flamed, its not just yas players its every champ
yeah but my name emphasizes it, you wanna know how many times I read "yasuo main lol" "typical yasuo main" from both my team and the enemy team. That's real fucking toxicity.

Just play him in the games you can play him in.

So not in most games, people'll permaban him because he's unfun to play against.
(He is fun to play, I'll give you that)

I just mute all. 

I give no fucks about other people if I feel like playing Yasuo in a norm. And actually get to play him.

bro i played yasuo for the first time ever against a kayle in mid the other day. 11/1/8 and got a quadra kill. They told me i was op broken and honstley the champion is pretty balanced. Only argument i have is that his crit passive is almost too gold efficient. maybe add it to the ultimate as a scaling percentage 15%/25%/35% but other than that I don't see him as a retarded champion that is out of control no matter what. Very fun champion, insane outplay potential, amazing utilization in teamfights and great for solo queue.

> [{quoted}](name=Trash Katarina,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=9FzqIbLK,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-05-29T03:18:15.570+0000)
>
> bro i played yasuo for the first time ever against a kayle in mid the other day. 11/1/8 and got a quadra kill. They told me i was op broken and honstley the champion is pretty balanced. Only argument i have is that his crit passive is almost too gold efficient. maybe add it to the ultimate as a scaling percentage 15%/25%/35% but other than that I don't see him as a retarded champion that is out of control no matter what. Very fun champion, insane outplay potential, amazing utilization in teamfights and great for solo queue.

Except that you will never put your hands on it put of normals, cuz it will always be banned.

People don't question whether he is fun to play, they question how fun he is to play against. Kinda like how Riot acknowledged Lee is so fun to play because his kit allows him to shit on pretty much anyone early game, well just a thought, that person getting shit on probably isn't having that much fun.
/yawn
Did I bore you?

See, im like that because when i want to play yasuo,
I know i'll feed.
And then i know i'll look the stereotypical yasuo player.
My fears exactly.
